body.name: Goodea Led Under Cabinet Lights, Motion Sensor Rechargeable Light, 1000mAh Puck Lights with IR Remote, Under Counter Lights for Kitchen,cabinets,Closet,Stairs Indoor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 48 mins
features: 【Motion & Night Sensor Puck Lights】-- Every led puck light with 8 pure white LEDs, brightness is 150LM ( 3 Lights in 1 Package ). These led cabinet lights with 2 sensor modes: Night Mode and Day Mode. They can detect the motion of human in the dark or daytime. Automatically open within 10ft/120°, automatically shut down after about 20 seconds after no motion is detected.

【IR Remote Control: Dimmable & Timing】-- These 3 Pcs dimmable closet lights come with a IR remote. In "ON" mode, the light will turn on all the time, and it can works with the IR remote control. There are 2 ways of adjustable brightness: ①10% 50% brightness, ② Step-less Dimming: pressing the +/- button of the IR remote control. And it has Timing Function with: 15, 30, 45, 60 or 120 mins. ( Note: the IR remote control also work for "Auto Mode" & "On Mode" )

【Rechargeble and Energy-Saving】-- With a built-in 1000mAh lithium battery instead of replaced AAA batteries, the rechargeable puck light lasts 6 hours on the Max Brightness (which can be used as emergency lighting). 3 puck lights with 1 USB cable, super convenient, environment-friendly and saving money.

【Easy to Install/Take Down】-- Method ①: Each puck light can be adsorbed on iron stuff, or installed on any surface with the attached sticker. Method ②: Equipped with a sticker mounting disk, install in 3 seconds at any where you want. Easily take the puck light off when you need a dash of light in the darkness and reposition.

【Wide Applications】--- Size: 0.9 x 3.3 x 3.3 inch. These puck lights battery operated are ideal as closet lights, under cabinet lights,wine cabinet lights, display lights, office lights, under counter lights for kitchen. Adding this hands-free rechargeable cabinet lighting to your home.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #5,926 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #66 in Under-Counter Light Fixtures

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Led closet puck light, under cabinet motion sensor light These stick-on closet puck lights have a 3-mode switch which is On-Auto-Off to set it always ON, Motion Sensor mode, or Off. Therefore, you can use these closet lights as normal night lights for closet/cabinet/drawer or motion sensor lights. Under Auto mode, you can choose Day or Night sensor mode by remote: 1. Night sensor mode Under Night sensor mode and dark environment, these under cabinet lights will automatically sense human motion within 10ft/120°range and shut off automatically after 20 seconds of no movement. In a bright light environment(daytime), the inductor will not be triggered and the light will be off. 2. Under Day sensor mode No matter the dark or bright environment, these under cabinet lights will automatically sense human motion within 10ft/120°range and shut off automatically after 20 seconds of no movement. Influence Angle: 100°(±20%) Induction distance: 10ft(3m)

USB Rechargeable Battery Built-in 1000mAh USB rechargeable battery, can be charged by any USB port, like a power bank, plug, or laptop. Energy saving and saving more money! Using Time (fully charged): ON-Mode: More than 6 hours, depending on different brightness. In the ''Auto' mode, the battery life depends on the number of use times. The average use time is more than 30 days after testing. Wireless Installation Using the included strong magnet sheets, the puck light can be installed in multiple locations such as cabinets and closets. The wireless puck light can stick on any ironwork or non-iron surface with a magnetic object with no extra wiring. When need to charge or change place, you can take off the closet light anytime. Product Parts: * 3 x Rechargeable LED Motion Sensor Puck Lights * 6 x Iron Sheet * 1 x USB Cable * 1 x User Manual * 1 x Remote Control * Product Size: 0.9 x 3.3 x 3.3 inch * Non-waterproof, only for indoor use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Let There Be Light... And There Was, Magically Everywhere!
reviews.reviewText: I recently got these Goodea LED Under Cabinet Lights, and let me tell you, it's like I've become the wizard of illumination in my own home. These puck lights are not just lights; they're like little glowing orbs of happiness.First off, the ease of use is fantastic. You don't need to be an electrician or even particularly handy. Just stick them where you want some light, and bam! It's like summoning little bright minions at your command. And with the motion sensor? It's like playing a magic game of "light on, light off" every time I walk by.The adhesion is super strong, much like my love for midnight snacks. I stuck these under my kitchen cabinets, and now sneaking in for a cookie feels like a covert operation in a well-lit, super stylish kitchen. They stick like they've taken a lifelong vow never to leave your side, or in this case, your cabinets.And value for money? Oh boy, it's like hitting the jackpot but with lights. You get six bad boys in a pack, and they're rechargeable! It's like they're saying, "Don't worry, we've got you covered for those dark corners, and we're eco-friendly too!"I've put them everywhere – under cabinets, in the closet, even on the stairs. Now, walking around my house at night feels like being in a fancy hotel where everything is perfectly lit. I half expect a butler to show up and ask if I need anything.In conclusion, if you want to add some pizazz toI recently got these Goodea LED Under Cabinet Lights, and let me tell you, it's like I've become the wizard of illumination in my own home. It's like they're saying, "Don't worry, we've got you covered for those dark corners, and we're eco-friendly too!"I've put them everywhere – under cabinets, in the closet, even on the stairs. Now, walking around my house at night feels like being in a fancy hotel where everything is perfectly lit. I half expect a butler to show up and ask if I need anything.In conclusion, if you want to add some pizazz to your home lighting without drilling holes or dealing with wires, these Goodea LED lights are the way to go. They're like little UFOs of light, beaming down in all the right places, making your home feel like a stage set for a fancy show where you're the star! Lights, camera, action – and it’s just you grabbing a snack in your fabulously lit kitchen. home lighting without drilling holes or dealing with wires, these Goodea LED lights are the way to go. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for! Perfect for my linen closet!
reviews.reviewText: I've had these lights for over a month in my linen closet and haven't had to recharge them yet. I use them on manual mode and they are very easy to turn on and off and are the perfect brightness.I did use additional 3M double-sided adhesive (that I purchased myself) on the magnets and I think that's why they are still stuck firmly in place. This is my only suggestion to improve these!Overall I am very pleased with these lights and would recommend them 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Indoor Lights
reviews.reviewText: Little indoor lights we bought for the shelves. Pretty neat, good lighting, can be individually controlled. They are a little temperamental, but stick up on the magnets well then can be individually charged! Very well worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got them to replace ones that took 3 batteries that would last a few weeks if we were lucky. So glad so many products are being made rechargeable now.These are much brighter than the battery ones. They have a nice feature of being red when you plug them in to charge and turning green when they are done so you don’t have to guess.The sensors are good. Not too sensitive but work in a reasonable amount of distance. No hand waving because they went off before I was done with them. They stay on as long as something is moving.LOVE that the metal they stick to has sticky on the back. No drilling to mount them. They are super lightweight. Even without the batteries in the old ones these are still lighter.If you are having trouble deciding between your options, you’ll be pleased with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Terrible battery life
reviews.reviewText: The only complaint I have is that the battery life is TERRIBLE. I’ve barely used mine after using the timer for 30 mins 4 times I have to charge it already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars OK, but Prefer Devices (NLA) I Purchased Pre-Sandy
reviews.reviewText: Update: 1/7/24: Down to 1 Star.After my initial review, the company Did contact me (Thank You), but I figured I could live with this product.Sadly, after this week, that's no longer the case. I've had one go out, but this week all three went out within minutes of each other. The 3 pack only offers one recharge cord. Maybe if 2 where offered it would be better?As it is, I'm currently searching for a different solution to my kitchen lighting issue and will then just toss these as they just won't work for me.Initial Review: Comparing this item to something similar I purchased pre-Sandy storm, I So Prefer the pre-Sandy purchase that's NLA. I used the pre-Sandy units to not only light my walk home from work but also light the inside of my home for the 10 days I was without power.Purchased this item to give me a little more light in my kitchen, thought the 3 pack would suffice, but I'd recommend purchasing twice as many as you plan.Admit that I like the USB recharge option of this unit vs battery only option of my pre-Sandy unit and don't recall my pre-Sandy purchase offering a remote device (on, off, or motion detection).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: everything was looking just great, then poof= off. very short lived charge, if i got 15 minutes i was lucky. it would have to be plugged in at all times to have the lights stay on. they are great lights if only they would hold charges, and stay on for at least a couple hours between charges.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Environmental friendly RE-CHARGEABLE small lights that connect w/magnet stickers
reviews.reviewText: I needed small lights for my daughter's new huge barbie/doll house. When I searched, I saw A LOT of lights that are battery powered. I wanted rechargeable so I don't have to keep using up batteries that are toxic for our environment. And here they are! Not only are they the right size, but they come with magnetic stickers so you can remove them from their place to recharge. Compared to battery powered small lights which are very cheap, these are literally twice the price. But the benefits still outweigh the costs specially at $3.83 a piece (when I bought them, they were $22.99 for a 6 pack) when I don't have to buy separate batteries.
